BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the department of sanitation from charging the New York city housing authority for sanitation services
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting the department of sanitation from charging the New York city housing authority for sanitation services.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of sanitation to develop a plan for ensuring proper disposal of rechargeable batteries used for powered mobility devices
